articles.title: Wall Street analysts expect Apple to set a new milestone by topping $100 billion in holiday quarter sales - msnNOW
articles.description: Growth in the holiday quarter means Apple is poised to post quarterly revenue topping $100 billion for the first time, according to Wall Street.
articles.content:
Apple on Wednesday is expected to post quarterly revenue topping $100 billion for the first time, according to Wall Street analysts.
